🎥 YouTube Transcript Downloader – Download transcripts from YouTube videos effortlessly.

YouTube Transcript Downloader is a powerful Chrome extension designed for anyone who needs quick and easy access to video transcripts. Whether you're a researcher, content creator, student, or just someone who prefers reading to watching, this tool streamlines the process of obtaining YouTube video transcripts.

✨ Key Features:
🔹 One-click transcript download from any YouTube video
🔹 Support for multiple languages (when available)
🔹 Clean, easy-to-read text format
🔹 Lightweight and fast performance
🔹 User-friendly interface

🛠️ How to Use:
1. Install the extension
2. Navigate to any YouTube video
3. Click the extension icon in your toolbar
4. The transcript will automatically download

Save time, improve accessibility, and enhance your YouTube experience with YouTube Transcript Downloader. Get instant access to video content in text form, making it easier to search, quote, or repurpose information from YouTube videos.
